long_description: The Thule Crossover Duffel daypack is perfect for travel that demands versatile carrying options. Carry it as a duffel with handles or carry it on your back with the shoulder straps. Zippered rear panel access lets you reach your gear and clothing. Large gusseted side pockets separate clean from dirty, wet from dry and work from play. Heat-molded, crushproof exterior compartment protects eyewear, portable electronics and other fragile items; compartment locks and can be removed for extra cargo room. Raised rails give the Thule Crossover Duffel extra protection from rough handling. Compression straps customize the duffel to the size of your load. Aluminum hardware and water-resistant fabrics combine to create a lightweight, durable bag. Breathable, air-mesh backpack straps adjust for comfort; also includes double webbing handles.
short_description: The Thule Crossover Duffel daypack is perfect for travel that demands versatile carrying options. Carry it as a duffel with handles or carry it on your back with the shoulder straps.
